description: Discover how to drive unlimited targeted traffic to your site and use the YouTube advertising platform work for your business.This training course was designed to help you create a long-term sales strategy with YouTube for your advertising platform. The lessons you learn will help you succeed for years to come!In this video series I'm going to show you step-by-step, as you watch over my shoulder, how you can get clicks for only 2 cents a click!
title: 2 Cents YouTube Traffic
instructors: Dot Com Success Academy, Kenz A.Soliman, Manar Helmy Mohamed, Samar sabry, Soha Mohamed
